articles.title: Catch Better Zzz's With These Bedding Essentials: Shop Mattresses, Pillows and More on Amazon
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a variety of new bedding and sleep accessories, including mattresses from brands like Zinus and Casper, cooling toppers, and ergonomic pillows. Zinus's memory foam mattress is designed for pressure relief, while Casper's mattress features a core to prevent sagging. Additionally, Amazon offers items such as sheet sets, comforters, alarm clocks, sound machines, earplugs, and lip masks to help improve sleep.

articles.title: Best Amazon Prime Day deals UK 2025: Ninja, Apple, LEGO and more
articles.author: Tom Tyers
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 features deals on various products. Specific product deals include Ninja Foodi Dual Zone Digital Air Fryer for £124.99, MAMMOTION YUKA mini 500 Robot Lawn Mower for £699, and eufy E15 Robot Lawnmower for £1,299, among others. Amazon Prime membership is required to take advantage of these deals.

articles.title: First UK Users Go Live on Giffgaff's 500Mbps Full Fibre Broadband Trial
articles.author: Mark Jackson
articles.summary: Giffgaff is trialing a 500Mbps home broadband product using nexfibre and Virgin Media's 10Gbps capable full fibre networks. Giffgaff is the first retail provider after Virgin Media to fully harness nexfibre's new wholesale FTTP network, which is currently available to over 2 million UK premises.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Get Up To 69% Off The 54 Best Deals Already Live
articles.author: Jordan Thomas
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 features deals on various products from brands like Dyson, Samsung, Yeti, and Instant Pot. Featured discounts include the Dyson V8 Cordless Stick Vacuum (36% off), Tempur-Pedic Tempur-Cloud Pillow (43% off), and Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet (50% off), among many other discounted items across various categories.

articles.title: Kidoz Inc. Announces Official Launch of the Prado SDK: a Powerful New Monetization Solution for Mobile App Developers
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Kidoz Inc. has launched the Prado SDK, a new platform designed to increase publisher revenues by connecting premium brand advertising directly to mobile apps. This SDK offers a privacy-focused and optimized monetization solution for developers worldwide, aiming to reduce reliance on third-party vendors.

articles.title: Locafy Launches AI-Driven SEO Product Suite for FY26  Jul. 7, 2025 21:40
articles.summary: Locafy has launched its FY26 suite of AI-powered SEO products designed to improve search visibility and streamline content production. The suite includes Localizer, which integrates listing syndication, AI-search optimization, review management, and Google Map Pack enhancement. The company also introduced an AI Voice Concierge to function as a virtual receptionist and customer service agent.

articles.title: Best Vacuum Cleaner Deals from Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features discounts on vacuum cleaners and robot vacuums.  Companies like Dyson, Shark, Dreame, Ecovacs, Roborock, Lefant, Eureka, and Tineco are offering price cuts on their products, including specific models with percentage discounts.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2: One Month Later
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, marking the beginning of Nintendo's next generation of gaming consoles.

articles.title: Microsoft's Edge browser now loads sites even faster
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Microsoft has significantly improved the performance of its Edge browser, achieving sub-300 millisecond First Contentful Paint (FCP) times. This update includes performance gains for features like split screen and the AI-powered Read Aloud feature, alongside previous improvements to downloads, history, and private browsing tabs. Microsoft plans further enhancements to Edge in the future, focusing on features like Print Preview and Extensions.

articles.title: Consumer Reports: Why you should wash new clothing
articles.author: Consumer Reports
articles.summary: Consumer Reports recommends Persil Everyday Clean Free & Sensitive and Costco's Kirkland Signature Ultra Clean Free & Clear as top-tested gentle detergents for washing new clothes, especially for individuals with sensitive skin. These recommendations aim to minimize irritation from chemicals and residue found on new garments.

articles.title: Rove's weed products took over our afternoon
articles.author: Rachelle Gordon
articles.summary: Rove has launched Live Resin Diamond vapes and Ice Packs pre-rolls. The vapes are loaded with 94–98 percent THC and are designed with a simple but polished hardware including a magnetic top, matte finish, and USB-C charging. The Ice Packs pre-rolls contains flower, THCa diamonds, and solventless ice hash rosin with up to 50 percent THC and are available in California, Nevada, Arizona, Illinois, Missouri, Massachusetts, New York, and New Jersey.

articles.title: This Classic New Balance Sneaker Continues to Prove Why It's an Icon Among Icons
articles.author: Jack Seemer
articles.summary: New Balance has relaunched its 992 sneaker, initially released in 2006, with new colorways, including a 'Dark Camo' variant. The 'Dark Camo' version features premium suede overlays, a breathable mesh base in a fall-friendly green, and Abzorb technology in the midsole. It is initially available exclusively at Extra Butter for $200, with a wider release expected in the fall alongside additional colorways.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day will last a full week this year!
articles.author: Yucatan Times
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day deals from July 15th to 21st in Mexico, offering discounts across technology, home goods, beauty products, fashion, toys, appliances, and cleaning supplies. The event is exclusively for Amazon Prime members and features limited-time promotions. During Prime Day, Amazon launches deals across all categories and some products reach their lowest prices ever.

articles.title: Apple stop working on folding tablet
articles.author: Azernews
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil its first foldable iPhone in the fall of 2026. Samsung is set to debut its Galaxy G Fold, a triple-folding smartphone, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9th.

articles.title: A Look Inside China's Eerie Factory Producing Advanced AI-Powered $3,000 ‘Companion Dolls' for Solitary Individuals
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: WMDoll, a Chinese sex doll manufacturer, is launching next-generation AI-powered sex dolls equipped with 'MetaBox' brains and integration with Large Language Models like ChatGPT, enhancing their responsiveness and interactivity.  These dolls, built with synthetic flesh and metal skeletons, offer diverse personalities and are designed to provide emotional companionship, with AI tools enabling them to engage in conversations and cater to the user's ego.

articles.title: Here's How to Score the Best Deals on Dyson for Prime Day
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on several of its products during Prime Day, including the V15 Detect Plus vacuum cleaner, V11 vacuum cleaner, and Big+Quiet Formaldehyde BP03 air purifier. The V15 Detect Plus is recommended as an up-to-date and powerful option, while the Big+Quiet Formaldehyde BP03 offers a high-quality HEPA filtration system.

articles.title: Donkey Kong Bananza Overview Trailer Gives Us Eight Minutes of Details
articles.author: This Gen Gaming
articles.summary: Nintendo released a new overview trailer for Donkey Kong Bananza. This suggests an upcoming or newly released game receiving promotional material.

articles.title: Best early Amazon Prime Day deals 2025
articles.author: Lillian Brown
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals on various products. These include the Nespresso VertuoPlus bundle, Samsung's Frame TV, Apple AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C, Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum, and the newest MacBook Air with M4 chip, new Amazon Echo Spot and many other products from different brands. Amazon's Omni Mini LED and Omni QLED promises a brighter picture with better colors and contrast.

articles.title: Inside chilling sex robot factory in China pumping out legions of next-gen AI-powered $3,000 ‘love dolls' for lonely men
articles.author: Patrick Harrington
articles.summary: WMDoll is enhancing its sex dolls with AI-powered features, including MetaBox brains connected to the cloud and integration with LLMs like ChatGPT for improved responsiveness and interactivity. These next-gen dolls, built with synthetic flesh and metal skeletons, aim to offer a more realistic and emotionally engaging experience, with customizable personalities and AI tools for emotional companionship.

articles.title: Wybot S2 Solar Vision review: Same bot, new battery-charging option
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Wybot introduced the S2 Solar Vision, a solar-powered pool cleaning robot with a docking and charging station. It features multiple operating modes and app connectivity, but its solar charging effectiveness varies, and battery capacity is a limitation. The robot is available at retailers like Wybot.com and Amazon.

articles.title: Inside chilling sex robot factory in China pumping out legions of next-gen AI-powered $3,000 ‘love dolls' for lonely men
articles.author: Patrick Harrington
articles.summary: WMDoll is enhancing its sex dolls with AI through its "MetaBox" brains connected to cloud-based LLMs, like ChatGPT, for more responsive and interactive experiences. These next-gen dolls feature realistic synthetic skin and offer multiple personality options to cater to users' emotional needs. Shenzhen Atall Intelligent Robot Technology also manufactures custom-made AI dolls with features tailored to different customer preferences.

articles.title: Next's £30 linen dress in four prints hailed 'nice and loose' in hot weather
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Next has introduced a £30-£42 Kaftan Mini Dress with Linen, available in four prints.  The lightweight, machine-washable dress features a relaxed fit, V-shaped collar, and short sleeves, receiving positive reviews for its comfort and quality. The article also mentions dresses from White Stuff and H&M.

articles.title: 22 Pre-Prime Day Deals On Items You've Been Putting Off Buying But Actually Need
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several companies are offering significant discounts on their products for Amazon Prime Day. Ring has a 50% off deal on a doorbell and interior camera bundle, FlexBreeze offers 20% off on its Pro Mist Fan, and Craftsman provides a 50% discount on a 230-piece tool set. Additionally, Roborock is offering 39% off on its robot vacuum and mop, KitchenAid has a 60% discount on a set of mixing bowls, Apple provides up to 32% off on its 2nd Gen Apple Watch SE, Levoit has 22% off on its air purifier, and Amazon offers 50% off the newest 4K Fire TV Stick.

articles.title: Olay whipped moisturiser just £14 on Amazon ahead of Prime Day
articles.summary: Amazon has launched discounted deals on Olay Regenerist Whip Day Face Cream as part of its Prime Day sale. The Olay Regenerist Whip Day Face Cream is offered at a discounted price of £14, reduced from £38. The Prime Day event runs until July 11.

articles.title: One Tool to Rule Floor Messes: Dreame Wet Dry Vacuums Go Big on Prime Day
articles.author: Dreame Technology
articles.summary: Dreame Technology offers special prices on its wet dry vacuums during Prime Day, spanning July 8-11, 2025. These devices, which have sold over 6 million units globally, are available on Dreame's Amazon Store and Dreametech.com.

articles.title: Nigerian Brands Shine At US Trade Fairs
articles.summary: NaijaBrandChick organized a Trade Fair and Exhibitions in New York, showcasing Nigerian brands to buyers from the US and North America. This event featured fashion, beauty, food, crafts, technology, and lifestyle innovations from Nigerian SMEs, providing them with a platform to expand into the global market.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Opens New European Distribution Hub in the Netherlands as Part of Global Logistics Transformation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd., a high-performance luxury skiwear and lifestyle brand, is mentioned.

articles.title: Get Roborock Prime Day deals that are sucking up savings
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Roborock is launching discounts during Prime Day on models like the Saros 10R and Qrevo S5V. New models feature advancements like increased suction power, improved navigation systems (StarSight Autonomous System 2.0), dual anti-tangle systems, and edge mopping capabilities, with some models offering wet-dry vacuuming.

articles.title: 30 Corps Members Receive N16m Unity Bank Business Grant
articles.author: Modupe Gbadeyanka
articles.summary: Unity Bank Plc awarded N16 million in business grants to 30 NYSC members through its Corpreneurship Challenge across multiple states, supporting innovative solutions in sectors like fashion design, bag making, and pastry making. The program, which aligns with the NYSC SAED, has invested over N100 million since 2019, fostering youth empowerment and SME development through business plan competitions and grants of up to N800,000.

articles.title: McDonald's Is Spicing Up Its Breakfast Menu—And We're Loving It!
articles.author: Mariah Thomas
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new Spicy McMuffin breakfast sandwich on July 8 at select locations nationwide. The sandwich features melty cheese, a freshly cracked egg, savory Canadian bacon, a buttered English muffin, and McDonald's signature Spicy Pepper Sauce. The launch also includes the Spicy Sausage McMuffin and the Spicy Sausage McMuffin with Egg as limited-time offerings.

articles.title: 新宝股份：公司宠物类电器已有部分产品推出海外市场，比如宠物喂食器等_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Xinbao Co. has already introduced some pet-related electrical appliances, such as pet feeders, to overseas markets. The company is increasing its research and development efforts in the area of pet appliances and plans to launch more products that meet market demands in the future.

articles.title: Ascendra International sets stage to redefine PH's network marketing
articles.summary: Ascendra International launched its network marketing business on June 30, 2025, in Mandaluyong City. The company distinguishes itself with a product-first, technology-empowered model, targeting Filipino entrepreneurs seeking real business ownership through automation tools and AI-powered systems.

articles.title: How Small Business Owners Can Beat the Big Guys at Their Own Game
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: OpenPhone introduces an AI solution designed for growing businesses, focusing on enhancing customer service and availability. Pink's Windows adopted OpenPhone, utilizing its AI to gather essential information and provide same-day quotes, improving customer engagement and service quality. This enables smaller companies to compete with bigger companies.

articles.title: MTN Ghana Launches MTN Ads to Revolutionize Digital Advertising
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: MTN Ghana's Chief Digital Officer, Ibrahim Misto, launched MTN Ads, a new advertising solution. This suite of advertising solutions is designed to deliver personalized campaigns through SMS, display, and audio channels, leveraging MTN's subscriber base to connect brands with customers.

articles.title: ‘Best Prime Day purchase ever!' say Amazon shoppers as Eufy robot vacuum gets shock 50% ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Amazon has launched early deals before Prime Day, including a significant price reduction on the Eufy G50 robot vacuum cleaner. The Eufy G50 is now offered at half its usual price.

articles.title: How to sign up for Amazon Prime for Young Adults discount: Membership, cost, more
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Amazon offers 'Prime for Young Adults', a membership available to individuals aged 18-24, providing benefits like Prime delivery, Prime Video, and exclusive discounts. The membership costs $7.49 monthly or $69 annually, with a free six-month trial available.

articles.title: Intended for professionals in the paint industry: Nirlat's new app
articles.summary: A new application is being launched to revolutionize the daily operations for professionals in painting, renovations, and finishing work.

articles.title: Amazon expands grocery deliveries in 15 UK towns and cities
articles.author: Ciaran Mcgrath
articles.summary: Amazon has expanded its rapid grocery delivery service to 15 cities in the UK through a partnership with GoPuff. Customers can now order everyday products, including groceries and essentials, with delivery promised in under an hour. This expansion follows an initial launch in Birmingham and Salford.

articles.title: AI unlocks new frontiers for retail in China
articles.author: Lin Lili (
articles.summary: China's retail sector is adopting AI innovations, like interactive shelves and unmanned stores, to enhance consumer experiences. AI-enabled shelves respond to voice commands to help shoppers, and e-commerce platforms are introducing virtual fitting rooms. These technologies allow retailers to deliver customized recommendations and targeted promotions.

articles.title: Sticky floors? This Shark steam mop is already on sale for Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Shark is offering the Steam & Scrub Steam Mop S8001, which is designed for cleaning sealed hardwood, marble, tile, and stone floors. The mop features steam and rotating pads, three cleaning modes, an XL water tank, LED headlights, swivel steering, and includes four Dirt Grip Soft Scrub Pads, providing stain removal and ease of use.

articles.title: The Bissell Little Green Mini Cleaner Is Under $70 Ahead Of Prime Day
articles.author: Janie Campbell
articles.summary: Bissell's Little Green Machine Mini portable carpet cleaner is now available at a discounted price on Amazon. This mini version features a 4-inch tough stain tool, an 8-ounce water tank, and includes a free bottle of Bissell's Spot & Stain with Febreze Freshness cleaner. Unlike the original model, this on-sale Mini version has hose tool that self-cleans and unclogs any blockage.

articles.title: Seoul startup reinvents the vending machine with AI
articles.author: Hong In-seok Yu Jung-in
articles.summary: Exiters, a Seoul-based startup, has launched a new retail system utilizing on-device AI for vending machines in gyms. This affordable system provides real-time inventory management and tailored marketing strategies. Exiters' solution aims to compete globally in the unmanned retail market, offering a cost-effective alternative to traditional AI vending units.

articles.title: 5 Tech Gadgets That Will Cost You Way More To Own Than You Think
articles.summary: Companies like Amazon (Alexa), Google (Nest), and Apple (HomePods) require subscriptions to their respective platforms for full functionality. Fitbit devices come with subscription plans like Apple Fitness+ and Fitbit Premium. Peloton's Bike+ requires a monthly All-Access Membership and Oura Ring needs mandatory monthly subscription fees which limits the functionality without a subscription.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day UK July 2025 LIVE: Best home, tech & beauty deals including 49% off Ninja air fryers dropping in HOURS
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day, offering significant discounts on various products. Early deals include 49% off Ninja air fryers and a 50% reduction on the Eufy G50 robot vacuum cleaner, now priced at £99.99.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day UK July 2025 LIVE: Best home, tech & beauty deals including 49% off Ninja air fryers dropping in HOURS
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day with deals on home, tech, and beauty products, including discounts on Ninja air fryers, Apple products, Samsung products and Amazon devices. The event will run for four days, offering exclusive discounts to Amazon Prime members with a free trial option available.

articles.title: This upcoming foldable may solve my biggest problem with tri-folding phones
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Tecno is preparing to launch the Phantom Ultimate G Fold, a new tri-folding smartphone featuring an inward-folding design for increased durability. The phone aims to be slimmer than other foldables, with a flat screen when fully opened, and further details are expected in mid-July with a planned release in Asia, Africa, and beyond.

articles.title: Amazon knocks £150 off 'better than Eufy' robot vacuum cleaner before Prime Day
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a significant discount on the Roborock Q5 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner, reducing its price from £299 to £149.99 for Prime subscribers, during its pre-Prime Day sales. The vacuum cleaner, lauded for its anti-tangling brushes and simultaneous vacuuming and mopping capabilities, is being promoted as an alternative to Eufy vacuums. The Eufy G50 Hybrid Robot Vacuum and Mop is also on sale for £139 reduced from £199.

articles.title: Do you expect to see Gen 10 revealed during July's Pokémon Presents?
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company is anticipated to present news regarding various Pokémon projects, including Pokémon Legends Z-A and the new Pokémon TCG Pocket expansion. There is speculation on whether the next generation of Pokémon (Generation 10) will be revealed during the Pokémon Presents event on July 22, potentially teasing the theme or starters for the new release.

articles.title: LG H & H, E -Mart -only 'Glow: Up' Summer Moisture and Calm Line 4
articles.author: Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: LG H & H has launched a new skincare line, the Hyaluron Pantenol moisture soothing line, under its Glow: Up by Beyond brand. The line includes a toner, serum, cream, and sunscreen designed for intense moisture and soothing effects to address summer skincare concerns. These products aim to offer high-performance skincare at reasonable prices, focusing on the 'Slow-Aging' concept.

articles.title: Update brings AI-based automation and simplified onboarding
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Samsung has released a major update to its SmartThings platform, introducing an AI-Driven Routine Creation Assistant that uses natural language commands to create automation routines. The update also features enhanced delay actions for precise automation and expands the Calm Onboarding program to more countries, improving the integration of Samsung products.

articles.title: iDEALios of the Week by Prescott Maid to Order: 35$ Off a New Cleaning Service
articles.author: Jessica Molyneux
articles.summary: Prescott Maid to Order is offering a new cleaning service with a $35 discount. This iDEALio offer is valid until July 31, 2025, and requires the customer to present the coupon upon ordering, mentioning iDEALios – Signals A Z.

articles.title: This 2-Minute skincare trick keeps you fresh all day in 40 degree Celsius heat
articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.summary: Neutriderm, an Australian pharmaceutical business, has launched the 'Neutriderm Summer Skin Rescue Duo' in India, consisting of a foaming face cleanser and a moisturizing lotion.  The cleanser contains Panthenol, Niacinamide, and ascorbic acid, while the lotion contains Vitamin E and Glycerin. The products are designed for tropical weather and aim to cleanse, hydrate, and revitalize skin without causing dryness or greasiness.

articles.title: 5 Ways AI Makes Google Search Work Harder For Your Brand
articles.author: Google Ads Contributor
articles.summary: Google is enhancing its search capabilities with AI, introducing features like visual search and AI Overviews.  Updates to Google Ads with AI Max for Search and Smart Bidding Exploration helps advertisers optimize campaigns, improve reach, and dynamically generate relevant ad content. Enhanced reporting offers greater transparency into AI-driven performance, improving ROI.

articles.title: TVS Jupiter 110 Launched in Nepal
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: TVS Motors launched its two-wheeler, TVS Jupiter 110, in Nepal. The scooter features a next-gen engine and several first-in-segment features. TVS Jupiter 110 is designed to meet customer expectations with engineering, technology, design and ergonomics.

articles.title: Huawei New Phone: Revolutionary Camera Tech Revealed
articles.summary: Huawei is launching a new phone with a revolutionary camera system, boasting advancements in low-light performance through new sensor technology and image processing. The new phone features enhanced zoom capabilities, including optical and hybrid zoom technology, and AI integration for scene recognition, image stabilization, and portrait mode, promising exceptional image quality and user experience.

articles.title: 29 Kitchen Products That Are So Handy, You'll Use Them Multiple Times A Day
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article presents new kitchen products. Ninja Crispi Air Fryer system, Emeril Lagasse dual zone air fryer, Dawn Platinum Powerwash dish spray, and Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer are highlighted. Also, Ninja Foodi 2-in-1 Flip Toaster, Anyday microwaveable cooking essentials, and Caraway cookware set are introduced.

articles.title: 全新一代速腾L实车曝光 内外变化明显_手机网易网
articles.summary: The new generation Sagitar L (速腾L) has been revealed with design changes including a more streamlined front, hidden door handles, and a new illuminating logo. Interior upgrades include a floating LCD instrument panel, central control screen, and electronic gear selector. The car will be equipped with a 1.5T engine.

articles.title: Best vacuum cleaner deals in the Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale
articles.author: Lois Borny
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day is approaching, offering discounts on vacuum cleaners from brands like Shark, Dyson, Eufy, Roborock, Vax, and iRobot. Deals include discounts on older models and robot vacuums, such as the Eufy robot vacuum cleaner which will be at its lowest price on Amazon. Shoppers can anticipate discounts on models from brands including Samsung and Vax as well.

articles.title: OnePlus Summer Launch event - How to watch the Livestream on 8th July
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the Nord 5 series (OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE5) and the OnePlus Buds 4 at the Summer Launch Event on July 8, 2025. The OnePlus Nord 5 features the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 and a 50MP camera, while the OnePlus Nord CE 5 runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex and has a 7,100 mAh battery. The OnePlus Buds 4 delivers up to 45 hours of playback and has dual drivers, dual DACs and Hi-Res LHDC 5.0.

articles.title: Stranger Fits.
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Netflix and New Era collaborated to launch a collection of six new hats. The hats range in price from $31.99 for adjustable options to $47.99 for fitted ones. The collection includes two Squid Game styles and a couple of Stranger Things designs.

articles.title: Amazon Prime for young adults includes a 6 month-free trial
articles.author: Ana Suarez
articles.summary: Amazon is launching 'Amazon Prime for Young Adults', a new Prime membership option for adults aged 18-24. This membership includes Prime benefits, cashback on select purchases, and a Grubhub trial, with a 6-month free trial followed by a monthly or annual subscription fee.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Series And Buds 4 Launching On July 8 In Summer Launch Event: How To Watch Live, Check Expected Specs
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5 smartphones along with the OnePlus Buds 4 on July 8, 2025. The OnePlus Nord 5 features Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, while the Nord CE 5 is powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex chip. The OnePlus Buds 4 offer up to 45 hours of playback with the charging case and supports Hi-Res LHDC 5.0.

articles.title: Israeli transcatheter co Restore Medical raises $23m
articles.author: Globes
articles.summary: The company is introducing a new transcatheter approach.

articles.title: Honor X9c 5G launched in India: Check price, specs, features and other details
articles.summary: Honor has launched its new X9c 5G smartphone in India, available through Amazon during the Prime Day sale from July 12 to 14. The phone is offered at a limited-time price of Rs 19,999, including launch discounts and bank offers. The Honor X9c features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset, a 6600mAh battery with 66W fast charging, and a 108-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Likely To Launch in Upcoming Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event on July 9; Know What To Expect
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to launch the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 at its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on July 9, 2025. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 might feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite chipset, up to 1TB storage, a 200MP camera, and a 4,400mAh battery, while the Galaxy Flip 7 may include a 4-inch outer display, a 6.85-inch inner display, a 50MP camera, and a Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite or Exynos 2500 chipset.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A Testing Out New Menu Item
articles.author: Renzo Pocholo Salao
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing two new dessert items, the Icedream Spin and Icedream Float, to diversify its menu. The Icedream Float combines the chain's signature soft serve with fountain soda, while the Icedream Spin blends these ingredients like a smoothie. These items have been tested in select markets and are listed on the Chick-fil-A website for $4.99, although pricing may vary.

articles.title: Adot Launches AiLead, an AI Customer Support Tool for Shopify Sellers
articles.summary: Adot has launched AiLead, an AI-powered customer service tool for Shopify sellers, in 2025. AiLead provides 24/7 multilingual assistance and personalized shopping guidance to improve conversion rates and meet rising consumer expectations. The tool is available on the Shopify App Store and developed by engineers from Google and TikTok.

articles.title: How to get Amazon Prime Day 2025 best deals with early discounts available
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Day sale, offering discounts on products from brands like Shark, Ninja, Oral-B, and Remington. Early deals are already available, including discounted Echo Dot & Ring Doorbell bundle, Shark Vacuum Cleaner, and Ninja Multi-Cooker.

articles.title: 35 Money-Saving Products You'll Be Smug To Use
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched a new "Sqeezy" sponge set. Oxo introduced a compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. Bissell released a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner.

articles.title: Robot Vacuum Deal: Fantastic Vac Now Just $129!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The robot vacuum market is experiencing increased competition, leading to lower prices and advancements in features. Companies like Roomba and Shark are offering models with features like smart mapping, voice control, and self-emptying dustbins. There's a trend toward AI-driven cleaning and integration with smart home ecosystems, along with new features like self-emptying dustbins and mopping capabilities.

articles.title: Rain-Ready Grooming: Product Swaps Every Man Should Make This Monsoon
articles.author: Bringing Ideas To Life
articles.summary: The content introduces alternative grooming products and services suitable for the monsoon season. It suggests product swaps like using matte hair wax instead of hair gel, gel-based moisturizers instead of heavy cream moisturizers, and lightweight beard serum or balm instead of thick beard oil. These recommendations aim to address common monsoon-related grooming issues like frizzy hair and oily skin.

articles.title: How to turn your any photo into magazine-style portrait using ChatGPT: 3 viral AI prompts that create pure magic
articles.summary: ChatGPT introduces AI tools enabling users to create studio-quality portraits from ordinary photos using detailed prompts. This innovative approach eliminates the need for professional photographers or complex editing software. Users can specify camera angles, lighting, and desired effects to generate ultra-realistic images.

articles.title: M&S luring family shoppers with bigger packs and new ranges
articles.author: Steve Farrell
articles.summary: M&S has launched several new products and expanded existing lines to attract family shoppers. These include larger pack sizes in the 'Bigger Pack, Better Value' range, a new own-label medicine range, new baby food lines including baby milk, upgraded homecare lines featuring 5-in-1 washing pods, and Fresh Market Specials like blueberry and cherry pots.

articles.title: 32 Cheaper Swaps For Trendy Summer Products
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder that eliminates shine and blurs pores. E.l.f. launched Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen with SPF 35 that doubles as a blurring primer. Essence introduced Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops which can be mixed with daily sunscreen.

articles.title: 50 Amazon Prime Day Deals on the Best Products We've Tested in 2025
articles.author: Madison Yauger
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features discounts on numerous products, including Sony WF-1000XM5 Wireless Bluetooth Noise-Canceling Earbuds, Novilla Memory Foam Mattress and Shark HD430 FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System. The sale also includes deals on Cosori Air Fryers, Eufy Robot Vacuums, Flexzilla Garden Hoses, and Aiper Scuba S1 Cordless Robotic Cleaners and Eufy Security SmartTrack Link providing opportunities to save on a variety of items.

articles.title: Unilever debuts AI-driven design unit to wean brands off TV-first model
articles.author: Peter Adams
articles.summary: Unilever has launched Sketch Pro, an in-house graphic design center leveraging AI to expedite content creation for its home care brands like Persil/Omo and Domestos.  In partnership with IPG Studios, Sketch Pro uses platforms like Adobe Firefly and Google Veo 3 to quickly develop consumer testing materials and adapt to social media trends, with success already seen in Jakarta with brands like Rinso and Sunlight on TikTok.  Unilever intends to expand Sketch Pro to 21 markets by next year to improve efficiency.

articles.title: Mums race to Asda to bag ‘insane bargains' on kids' clothes scanning for £2 and ‘saving £50 on summer hols stuff
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Asda launched its first stand-alone George store in Leeds, featuring affordable fashion, homeware, toys, and a café. Furthermore, Kat Farmer launched a new George at Asda collection, expanding Asda's product offerings.

articles.title: Mums race to Asda to bag ‘insane bargains' on kids' clothes scanning for £2 and ‘saving £50 on summer hols stuff
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Asda launched its first stand-alone George store in Leeds on May 10th, featuring fashion, homeware, toys, baby gear, and a cafe. This new store format is being tested, and a decision will be made later this year about potential nationwide expansion.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland slashes price of must-have gazebo for BBQs and summer events as Met Eireann predicts 28C temperatures
articles.author: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
articles.summary: Lidl is offering the XL Gazebo at a reduced price of €79.99 in stores. Additionally, Lidl is introducing the Silvercrest 1500W Steam Mop & Handheld Steam, priced at €39.99, which features adjustable spray mist, a removable water tank, and can heat up in 30 seconds.

articles.title: Bombardier Inaugurates the Innovation and Design Centre Dedicated to Creating the Future of Business Aircraft Customer Experience
articles.author: Bombardier Inc.
articles.summary: Bombardier has inaugurated its Innovation and Design Centre to drive customer-centric design and rapidly introduce innovations in business aircraft. The centre allows multidisciplinary teams to experiment, develop, and test new ideas, focusing on new product design and innovation.

articles.title: Bombardier Inaugurates the Innovation and Design Centre Dedicated to Creating the Future of ...
articles.author: Bombardier Inc.
articles.summary: Bombardier has inaugurated the Bombardier Innovation and Design Centre in Montreal. This center will focus on developing innovations and improvements for Bombardier's aircraft portfolio, including testing cabin mockups and prototypes, aimed at enhancing customer experience. A dedicated team will work in confidentiality to redefine the business aircraft customer experience.

articles.title: Bombardier Inaugurates the Innovation and Design Centre Dedicated to Creating the Future of Business Aircraft Customer Experience
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: Bombardier launched its Innovation and Design Centre in Montreal. This centre will focus on developing and testing innovations for Bombardier's aircraft, including full-scale cabin mockups and prototypes, aimed at enhancing customer experience and keeping the aircraft portfolio ahead of the curve.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 India launch tomorrow: Check out the expected specifications, price, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching two new smartphones, the OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5, in India on July 8. The Nord 5 features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, a 7,000 mAh battery, and a 120 Hz OLED screen, while the Nord CE 5 includes a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex and a similar battery capacity. Both devices will be available on Amazon India and OnePlus' official online store.

articles.title: Inside The Hindu's approach to reader retention
articles.author: Aultrin Vijay
articles.summary: The Hindu introduced personalized notifications, games within their app as user retention tools with positive initial results. They are also developing AI-generated audio explainers, deep-dive e-books, topical webinars, adaptive content like Shorts and AI summaries, and FAQ feature to enhance user engagement and make content more accessible.

articles.title: Ai+ Pulse and Ai+ Nova 5G Will Launch Tomorrow in India With NxtQuantum OS; Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Ai+ is launching the Ai+ Pulse and Ai+ Nova 5G smartphones in India on July 8. The Ai+ Pulse is expected to feature an Unisoc T7250 processor and a 50MP rear camera, while the Ai+ Nova 5G is expected to feature a Unisoc T8200 chipset. Both smartphones may offer up to 1 TB expandable storage and will run on NxtQuantum OS.

articles.title: Ginvera World Spa Expands Portfolio With New Body Scrub Collection
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Ginvera Malaysia has launched the Ginvera World Spa Body Scrub, an extension of the Ginvera World Spa brand. This new product range includes three variants: Peachy Rose, Mugwort & Mung Bean, and Honey Olive, each designed for specific skin concerns. The scrub is now available at Watsons stores and online platforms.

articles.title: AI seen as a necessary tool for press agencies
articles.author: Thuong Tran
articles.summary: Vietnam Economic Times / VnEconomy introduced the full Asko Platform, along with smarter second-generation models, on June 2, 2025. This platform includes the Askonomy chatbot and a suite of AI-powered tools. The new version of Askonomy is based on Mistral's open-source models and enhances content distribution and reader engagement by providing instant answers in an interactive Q&A format.

articles.title: 17 Brilliant QR Code Ideas to Make Your Campaign Remarkable
articles.author: The Tribune
articles.summary: QR TIGER provides dynamic QR code solutions to enhance product campaigns, offering customization, tracking, retargeting, and integration tools. These QR codes link to product demos, warranty activations, customer reviews, and secret deals, offering businesses ways to engage customers and streamline processes. Restaurants are able to use QR codes to provide different meal menus at different times to reduce confusion and printing costs.

articles.title: Gisou's new honey gloss shampoo and conditioner gave my hair 'all-day bounce'
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Gisou introduced its latest product, a honey gloss ceramide. This new product launch expands Gisou's offerings.

articles.title: SGS Expands Scope of Conformity Assessment Services for Kuwait Imports
articles.summary: SGS expands its services under Kuwait's Product Conformity Assessment (PCA) program, now offering certification for more regulated products like detergents and household appliances. The expansion also includes Kuwait Energy Efficiency Rating (KW EER) program, covering rotating electrical machines, clothes dryers, washing machines, and refrigerators. These services help manufacturers and exporters comply with Kuwait's latest energy efficiency and product performance requirements.

articles.title: We've been writing about Amazon Prime Day for years - these are the best early deals that are worth buying
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Amazon's Prime Day sale starting July 8, 2025, features deals on various products. Companies like Ring are offering deals on products like the Ring Battery Video Doorbell and Ring Indoor Camera, and Philips is offering deals on the Philips OneBlade 360 Face, Hybrid Electric Beard Trimmer & Shave. Deals on items from Tan-Luxe x Paris Hilton, Havaianas, Tefal, Garmin, and O'Keeffe's Healthy Feet are also featured.

articles.title: 'Chaos in a trenchcoat – How designers can succeed in a start-up'
articles.author: Tom Petty
articles.summary: Incident.io created a component library because designers and engineers felt that their work was getting butchered in production. Incident.io also rolled out a brand identity refresh across its site and marketing assets because the co-founder Chris Evans and a designer realized that the existing identity needed a new coat of paint.

articles.title: 新亚电子：藕芯结构解决方案在224G/448G外部高速铜缆上处于推广应用阶段_手机网易网
articles.author: 财联社
articles.summary: 新亚电子 announced that the '藕芯结构' solution is now in mass production for the PCIe series. The solution is also in the promotion and application stage for 224G/448G external high-speed copper cables.

articles.title: I tried coffee from Lidl and M&S - £2.30 jar was the best
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: The article reviews instant coffee products from multiple retailers. Lidl's Bellarom Rich Roast instant coffee is priced at £1.79. Aldi's Alcafe Rich Roast coffee costs £1.99. Sainsbury's coffee is priced at £2.30 and M&S' Rich and Smooth coffee costs £1.20.

articles.title: Nykaa shares rise nearly 3% after strong Q1 FY26 update
articles.summary: Nykaa anticipates strong growth in FY26, with consolidated net revenue growth for Q1 expected in the lower end of the mid-twenties. The Beauty vertical projects GMV growth in the higher mid-twenties, while the Fashion vertical aims for mid-twenties GMV growth, driven by platform traction, product assortment, and customer acquisition.

articles.title: Heyyy Revolutionizes Social Profiles: Transforming Presence into Purpose
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Jamm Labs, led by Able Joseph, has launched Heyyy, a new social network focused on meaningful connections. Heyyy features Contextual DMs, which allows users to state intentions for hiring, selling, or connecting. The platform also offers integrated event tools to facilitate offline interactions and active community engagement.

articles.title: Woolworths opens first-of-its-kind Food Emporium in Cape Town
articles.author: capeetc
articles.summary: Woolworths has launched its first 'Food Emporium' in Durbanville, Cape Town. The new store features include a florist counter, a revamped premium food counter called 'Our Kitchen', an expanded seafood selection, a new butcher counter and bakery and patisserie sections. The Emporium also offers an elevated pantry experience, a confectionery alcove, and a wine alcove.

articles.title: 네오플, ‘사이퍼즈' 14주년 쇼케이스 Highfive서 신규 캐릭터 ‘앤지 헌트' 공개
articles.summary: Neople introduced a new character, 'Angie Hunt,' to its game 'Cyphers' as part of its 14th-anniversary celebration.  'Angie Hunt' features unique abilities such as 'Black Flame Ball' and the ultimate skill 'Caladrius'. The update including the new character is scheduled for release on the 10th of this month.

articles.title: Honor X9c Arrives in India With ‘Unbreakable' Body, Titanium Design At Under ₹22,000
articles.author: Info Desk
articles.summary: Honor has launched the X9c, a durable mid-range smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset, a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a 108MP rear camera, and a 6600mAh battery with 66W fast charging. Priced at ₹21,999, the Honor X9c will be available in Jade Cyan and Titanium Black on Amazon starting July 12.

articles.title: 108MP କ୍ୟାମେରା ସହ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେଲା Honor X9c 5G ସ୍ମାର୍ଟଫୋନ; ଦାମ କେତେ ଜାଣନ୍ତୁ
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Honor has launched the X9c 5G smartphone in the Indian market, making it exclusively available on Amazon India. The smartphone features a 108MP camera, Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC processor, 8GB RAM, and a 6600mAh battery.

articles.title: Best Face Mists for Instant Hydration and Freshness
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Forest Essentials introduces a Pure Rosewater Mist made from steam-distilled roses, ideal for hydrating and toning skin. Suroskie launches Roses Glass Skin Mist, a dual-function toner and setting spray for glowing skin. Dot & Key offers a Strawberry and Niacinamide Mist with SPF 50+ for sun protection and hydration, while Tint Emily In Paris Face Mist provides a calming blend of cucumber, green tea, and rose for daily hydration.

articles.title: Poco F7 Review: A benchmark in its segment for what a phone should aspire to be
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Poco has launched the Poco F7, a new smartphone featuring a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a 7,550 mAh battery, and a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, priced at ₹35,999. The phone includes a 50 MP Sony IMX882 primary camera and runs on HyperOS based on Android 15.

articles.title: Poco F7 Review: Sets the bar high for its segment
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Poco has launched its latest smartphone, the Poco F7, featuring a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a 7,550 mAh battery, and a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, priced at ₹35,999. The phone boasts a dual camera layout with a 50 MP primary sensor and a 20 MP selfie camera, along with 90 W Turbo Charging capabilities. The F7 aims to redefine its segment with its premium features and performance.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7 and Watch 8 available with Rs 5,999 voucher, but there is a catch
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Watch 8 series on July 9. Pre-reservations are open until July 9, offering a Rs 5,999 e-Store voucher for use on Samsung's website or app when purchasing these new Galaxy devices.

articles.title: L'Oréal's AI: The Future of Beauty?
articles.summary: L'Oréal is leveraging generative AI to transform the beauty industry, introducing products and services like the Beauty Genius, a personalized beauty assistant, and Noli, an AI-driven beauty marketplace. Other companies like Estee Lauder and Unilever are also adopting AI to create personalized experiences, such as virtual makeup assistants and virtual scalp therapists. These initiatives highlight the growing trend of using AI to innovate and enhance customer experiences in the beauty and cosmetics sector.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 battery size & IP rating could be a bummer
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. Leaks suggest the Galaxy Z Fold 7 may have a 4272mAh battery, while the Galaxy Z Flip 7 could feature a 4,174mAh battery. Both models are expected to have an IP48 rating for water and dust resistance.

articles.title: Swap your margarita for a cocktail-infused body wash this Dry July
articles.summary: Sundae Body is releasing a new range of whipped shower foams. This launch follows their previous success with whipped shower foam products and collaborations with other brands.

articles.title: This is your sign to swap your margarita for a cocktail-infused body wash this Dry July
articles.summary: Sundae Body is launching a new range of whipped shower foams. This launch follows previous collaborations and special edition scents, aiming to revitalize the daily shower routine.

articles.title: L'Oréal's AI Weapon Could Kill Traditional Beauty Industry Forever
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: L'Oréal partnered with Nvidia to utilize generative AI to enhance its beauty products and marketing strategies.  This includes scaling its CreAItech platform for creating visualizations and assets, and launching AI-powered tools like Beauty Genius, a personalized beauty assistant, and Noli, an AI-powered beauty marketplace. L'Oréal also aims to reduce material and energy waste during the formulation process through generative AI.

articles.title: The curious rise of giant tablets on wheels
articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.summary: In 2022, LG launched the StanbyME, a 27-inch tablet featuring LG's webOS, positioned as a portable wireless private TV screen with a built-in battery. The device is designed for watching shows and movies, video conferencing, and viewing online lectures. Now, StanbyME faces competition from other brands including Samsung.

articles.title: Time to ditch your Galaxy phone? Samsung is releasing something better this week
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 at an Unpacked event in New York on July 9. These upgraded foldables will feature thinner, lighter, and more durable designs, enhanced power, and integrated AI. One of the devices may also receive the Ultra branding, signifying it as Samsung's most powerful offering.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Gets A Massive Price Drop Of Rs 14000 Online: Check The Deal Here
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 Pro in April 2025. The smartphone features a 6.7-inch curved pOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, triple rear camera setup with a 50-megapixel Sony LYTIA 700C main sensor, and runs on Hello UI based on Android 15 with smart Moto AI features.

articles.title: July turns red-hot for smartphone launches: OnePlus Nord 5, Samsung foldables set to stir market
articles.author: Technology Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its Nord 5 series on July 8, featuring the Nord 5, Nord CE 5, a new OnePlus Pad, and the OnePlus Buds 4. Samsung will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 foldables, along with the Galaxy Watch 8 series at its Galaxy Unpacked event. A new AI+ brand will also introduce its Pulse and Nova 5G smartphones in India on July 8.

articles.title: ‘Such a pinch yourself moment': Close friends launch brand in major retailer
articles.author: Mary Madigan
articles.summary: Georgie Gilbert and Camille Peressini launched their natural body wash brand, SOMA, in Woolworths, featuring fragrances like Amber & Jasmine. The product, priced at $18, is targeted towards Millennials, offering a luxury experience at an affordable price. The launch was accelerated due to unexpected high demand and positive social media attention.

articles.title: 39 Things That Reviewers Say They Would Absolutely Recommend
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, a new iteration of its body lotion, featuring a whipped vanilla, musk, and soft caramel scent for skin protection during shaving. Juno & Co. introduced Clean 10 Cleansing Balm with pearl barley and vitamin E, designed to remove all traces of makeup, leaving skin feeling fresh. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, which is designed to conceal and brighten dark circles under eyes.

articles.title: In a first, Balkh company exports detergent to Europe
articles.author: Saifullah Karimi
articles.summary: Qatra, a private company, exported a 21-tonne shipment of its detergent, valued at $30,000 USD, to London, England. This marks the first time the company's detergent has been exported to European countries. Previously, Qatra's products were exported to countries including Uzbekistan and Tajikistan.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G96 5G price leaked in India ahead of its launch: Check out the expected Camera, display, battery, colours, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G96 5G in India on July 9th, with sales through Flipkart. The Moto G96 5G features a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 CPU, up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage, a 50MP OIS primary camera, and a 6.67-inch pOLED 3D curved screen with a 144 Hz refresh rate. The expected price of Moto G96 5G will be about ₹22,000.

articles.title: Cracking the code of perfect-sounding earbuds with planar drivers and AI
articles.summary: Huawei has introduced the FreeBuds 6, featuring a dual-driver acoustic design with an 11mm dual magnetic driver for bass and a UHF Planar Diaphragm Driver for higher frequencies up to 48kHz. The FreeBuds 6 uses AI to personalize sound by analyzing ear canal shape, wearing habits, and ambient noise to adjust EQ and volume for an optimal listening experience, powered by HUAWEI SOUND audio technology.

articles.title: Free RPG on Steam: Download & Keep Forever
articles.summary: Atlus has launched "Persona 5: The Phantom X," a new free-to-play RPG, on Steam, iOS, and Android platforms. This spin-off of the popular Persona 5 series introduces a new protagonist and incorporates gacha mechanics, offering a fresh experience within the familiar Persona universe.

articles.title: 一个气泡水广告，为何几十万人围观？原来整个都是Veo 3生成的
articles.summary: Veo 3, an AI video generation model, features 'audio-visual synchronization' and facilitates AI video creation. The team created a sample video for 'Liquid Death' which showcases Veo 3's capabilities in creating consistent characters and scenes throughout the video. The model's advanced features present a new approach to video generation.

articles.title: 10 strategic design principles for launching a DTC brand in India
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: The article highlights several examples of Direct-to-Consumer (DTC) brands successfully launching products and services in India. boAt disrupted the audio space with its swagger, Dot & Key made skincare feel playful, and Nua introduced a novel femcare solution addressing unmet needs. The key is strategic design, focusing on consumer insights and distinctive branding to resonate with target audiences and break category conventions.

articles.title: Kia Sportage recalled for fire risk
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse these deals to potentially secure a great price.

articles.title: TikTok building new version of app ahead of expected sale, reports say
articles.author: Honolulu Star-Advertiser
articles.summary: TikTok is developing a new version of its app for users in the United States. This new version is likely aimed at addressing regulatory concerns or adapting the app for the specific needs of the US market.

articles.title: Along with LG Household & Health Care, E-Mart will introduce a moisture and soothing line that c..
articles.author: Park Yoon Kyun
articles.summary: E-Mart, in collaboration with LG Household & Health Care, is launching a new line of ultra-low-cost cosmetics called "Glow: Up by Beyond Hyaluron Panthenol," featuring four types of moisture and soothing products priced at KRW 4,950 each. This launch follows the successful introduction of the first "Glow: Up by Beyond" line, demonstrating E-Mart's continued expansion of its ultra-cheap cosmetics offerings.

articles.title: New Galaxy Z Flip 7 leak reveals a massive upgrade
articles.author: Vishnu Sarangapurkar
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Flip 7, featuring a larger cover screen, at its Galaxy Unpacked event in New York. Leaks reveal a horizontal scrolling feature for apps and widgets on the cover screen, which may also showcase the new Now Bar. Pre-orders for the Galaxy Z Flip 7 are expected to begin on the launch day, with wider availability commencing by July 25.

articles.title: How Nigerian business owners leverage content creation in competitive market
articles.author: Femi Akinyemi
articles.summary: A video content creation agency in Nigeria is offering a hybrid solution to businesses struggling to produce consistent, high-quality video content. This service handles creator sourcing, scripting, location planning, filming, and editing, providing clients with ready-to-post videos for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts. The agency aims to help businesses tell stories, explain their offers, and connect with their target audience.

articles.title: TikTok building new version of app ahead of expected sale, reports say
articles.author: Mrinmay Dey
articles.summary: TikTok is developing a new version of its app specifically for users in the United States and plans to launch it on U.S. app stores on September 5. The existing app will continue to work until March of next year, after which users will need to download the new app to continue using the service.

articles.title: The tech deals everyone is adding to cart this Prime Day
articles.author: Chanelle Mansour
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Day sale from July 8 to July 14, offering discounts on tech products. Savings will be available on leading brands such as Apple, Bose, Dyson, Samsung, and Sony.

articles.title: Feel-good factor: auto brands host events to connect with youth
articles.author: CAO YINGYING
articles.summary: 212 unveiled its upgraded T01 off-roader, featuring five major technical enhancements and four new color options. SAIC Motor's MG brand launched the new MG5 sedan and the new MG Cyberster, an electric convertible with scissor doors. MG plans to launch 13 new energy vehicle models over the next two years, investing over 100 billion yuan.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 design tipped ahead of July 9 launch
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its new foldable phones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9. A video of the Galaxy Z Flip 7 has already surfaced, providing a preview before the official launch.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 hands-on videos leaked ahead of July 9 launch
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy Z Fold and Flip smartphones. Handson videos of these devices have leaked prior to their official July launch.

articles.title: Adani Enterprises To Raise Rs 1,000 Crore Via NCDs; Issue Opens From July 9
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Adani Enterprises Limited (AEL) has launched its second public issuance of non-convertible debentures (NCDs).

articles.title: Omnix Launches AI-First Managed Services to Transform Next-Gen IT Support
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Omnix International launched its AI-first Managed Services offerings. These offerings are designed to leverage AI for improved management and digital transformation solutions.

articles.title: L'Oréal's AI Weapon Could Kill Traditional Beauty Industry Forever
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: L'Oréal partners with NVIDIA to deploy generative AI. This partnership will create personalized marketing campaigns and product visualizations. The deployment signifies an advancement in L'Oréal's service offerings through AI-driven features.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch series' biggest flaw is something Apple nailed years ago
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new Galaxy Watch. The launch is imminent.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Hands-On Video, Images Leaked, Showing Beautiful Edge-To-Edge Cover Display
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 9 at the Samsung Galaxy Unpacked event. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 was initially expected to be a minor upgrade compared to the Flip 6.

articles.title: Honor X9c 5G launched in India: Check price, specs, features and other details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Honor launched the Honor Xc G in India. The launch details include the phone's price, specifications, and features.

articles.title: Lenovo Legion Go S SteamOS review: Windows get ye gone
articles.author: Rock
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching a new version of their Legion Go S. This new version swaps Windows 11 for an alternative operating system to better suit handheld gaming PCs.

articles.title: PawOrigins Begins a New Chapter With Veterinarian-Formulated Pet Longevity Products and Rescue
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: PawOrigins LLC, an online pet products company, was established. The company focuses on providing pet products online.
